trigger_description: This trigger fires every time a new Show Hacker News story is posted.
This trigger fires every time a new story is posted by the user you specify.
This trigger fires every time a Hacker News story becomes a best story.
This trigger fires every time a new comment is posted by the user you specify.
This trigger fires every time a new Ask Hacker News story is posted.
This trigger fires every time a Hacker News story becomes a top story.
This trigger fires every time a new job is posted to Hacker News.
